title: Supply
creator_credit: Terry Kahn, Arla Sorkin, Ilene Kahn and Terry Kahn Organization
brief_description: Shows how the amount of goods produced and supplied responds to market price and how anticipated sales, selling prices, costs and profits guide a potential producer.
